website_summaries.verdict: High-end smart pen that instantly transfers handwritten notes and drawings to your device. Compatible with Apple and Android products.
pros: Transfer, annotate, and edit anything written by hand on your tablet or computer
Sync instantly or at a later time
Audio recorded from smartphone can be synced with notes
cons: One of the more expensive smart pens available

customer_reviews.title: Don't lose the cap
customer_reviews.text: Pen works well but is incompatible with neo pens and app (the underlying tech) and if you lose the cap you are out of luck because they refuse to sell you a replacement. A $179 pen you can't use without getting ink on your pocket all for the sake of a $10 pen cap.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Does not really sync with Google Calendar
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes that this product would minimize duplication of efforts. I like to hand write appointments and was excited that this product could sync with google calendar. Even with very clear, concise writing, it still does not sync well in that it does not translate the handwritten text correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey T.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pen works great but the supplies are difficult to find and in very limited options.
customer_reviews.author: Candice M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Changing note-taking.
customer_reviews.text: this product changes the way I take notes at work, during therapy, and at home. And soon at school. PErfect to use with Evernote and other cloud applications, and you can email yourself or your cloud applications searchable pages. The paper tables you have to buy with these are expensive, but there's plenty of space for a half-year's worth of work notes....things to do, meeting notes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Joe V.

customer_reviews.title: works great. I've had mine for a few months now ...
customer_reviews.text: works great. I've had mine for a few months now with none of the problems that some others have run into. I really enjoy when I'm actively paired with the phone app and can control the color, thickness, and stroke type. If I could add one feature it would be to optimize how the pages get projected when mirroring the phone with an apple TV.
customer_reviews.author: Team Mic

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Great for notes!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, super great for taking notes in class (I'm in college right now). It helped my with being able to organize my notes and make then easier to read and understand. Too bad my ex-boyfriend took it from me and I have not seen it since. It's super amazing. Kind of pricey but worth it. Moral of the story keep it away from grabby exes though because it's so good they'll take it. And at the moment I don't have the money to buy another one. But I will again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Pen has stopped working and no support!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it’s my second one, but it has just stopped working. Can’t power it up after 1 year! Moleskin said contact Amazon! What great customer service. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Evans

customer_reviews.title: Horrible experience with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this product, because I take notes constantly for work and my thought was that I'd be able to get rid of paper and have PDF's of my notes. The instructions for this product are non-existent and my experience so far has been frustrating. I'm going to keep trying to figure this out and decide whether to keep or send back the product, but I can't believe how little thought went into the user experience out of the box. I would have expected much more from a strong brand like Moleskine.
customer_reviews.author: Betaman2003

customer_reviews.title: Good product...
customer_reviews.text: ...but it's a little ways away from being perfect. I am sure Moleskin is working on making the product better.
customer_reviews.author: BMWOwner

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This pen is amazing, it works great with the Moleskine planner and syncs to my google calendar. It merges paper and technology perfectly. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: LJP

customer_reviews.title: This Pen is Crap
customer_reviews.text: Does not function. Cannot pair. Returning this huge inconvenience on Saturday. Definitely do not recommend. Going with any other solution, hopefully anything else actually works. Unsharpened pencil > This garbage.
customer_reviews.author: S. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great Electronic Note taking System
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used multiple electronic nite taking systems. This by far is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Aram

customer_reviews.title: Pen works great
customer_reviews.text: A little clumsy to hold but I’m getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the pen and the notebook
customer_reviews.text: frustrated. You don't know until you get it that it can't be used with any corporate Exchange accounts. So, I can't use it with my work calendar. I then tried to use it with iCal. It would never synch. The main reason I bought this was so I could have a hard copy of my calendar with me along with my notes. I really liked the pen and the notebook, and they synch well with the Moleskine app. It's the calendar feature that is really lacking. If you wanted to buy the notebook and just use that, you're all set. Just don't try to use it with the calendar.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Just don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: worse experience ever. I just received pen+ ellipse it charged for 3 hours. I tried to turn it on but it didn't and it didn't charge again. You chat website kept me waiting for an hour without respond. The problem I'm stuck with the pen as I shipped it outside USA and can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed N

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Awful...no return policy and massively hyped with impossible interface. Forget about editing illustrator files. The graphics are nothing but endpoints. This looks like a POC release , not ready for retail. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Kroeker

customer_reviews.title: Need to step up their game
customer_reviews.text: I saw this produt and and had high hopes since I work from multiple locations and have notes everywhere. The pen worked fine, smooth writing and comfortable to hold but they must have forgotten to make the companion app amazing. It syncs to Evernote and others but I then wondered why I didn’t just take a picture of my handwritten note through Evernote for free. Also, why all the specialized products that you have to buy to use it? Needs work.
customer_reviews.author: encipher

customer_reviews.title: Dead 15 days after warranty
customer_reviews.text: 15 days outside of the one-year warranty, the pen is completely dead. This is essentially the same product as Neo Pen, and I’ve had issues with their pens as well. These are not built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

product_meta.title: Moleskine Pen+ Ellipse Smart Pen - Designed for Use with Moleskine Notes App for Digitally Storing Notes (Only Compatible with Moleskine Smart Notebooks, Sold Separately)
feature_bullets: SMART PEN: Seamlessly transfer what's written on the notebook page to your device, digitizing analog notes & allowing you to notate, share, search, edit, & organize your vision. Android & Apple compatible.

NCODED TECHNOLOGY: The Pen+ Ellipse digital smart pen comes with a USB recharging cable, 1 pen tip ink refill & user manual. Ncoded technology enables the Pen+ to transfer your notes from page to device screen in real time!

MULTIMEDIA FUNCTION: Record audio to sync with your notes; flesh out your ideas & ensure that nothing gets lost in translation. Explain, clarify, detail. Save it in PDF & upload to Google or Evernote.
MOLESKINE VERSATILITY: Writers, students, artists, professionals & travelers love our notebooks, planners, pens, bags & accessories. From journals to backpacks, there's a Moleskine product for you.

MOLESKINE QUALITY: We're dedicated to culture, travel, memory, imagination, & personal identity—both physical & digital. We bring this commitment to our notebooks, bags, apps & smart pens & notebooks.
